metadata.titleEn: Surface energy balance based global land evapotranspiration (EB-ET 2000-2017)
metadata.titleCn: 基于地表能量平衡的全球陆地每天/每月地表蒸发产品（EB-ET 2000-2017）
metadata.description:
Daily and Monthly evapotranspiration (5km x 5km spatial resolution) for global land area was derived from satellite data and a surface energy balance method (EB). The global 5 km daily and monthly ET dataset is produced with the revised SEBS algorithm in Chen et al. 2019 JGR and Chen et al. 2013 (JAMC). For how to obtain seamless daily evaporation data by thermal infrared, please refer to Chen et al. 2021 JGR. This paper also compares different evaporation products. The results show that this product is significantly better than Landflux, GLEAM, MOD16, GLDAS and ERA-Interim products in irrigation area. The downscaling of reanalysis forcing data is detailed in this paper. MODIS LST, NDVI, Global forest height, GlobAlbedo, GLASS LAI have been used in this ET calculation. The ET dataset will be updated to near-present with the availability of input dataset. The global 5 km sensible heat flux, net radiation, latent heat flux will be open with the email contact with Dr. Xuelong Chen. 

Daily ET File name: 20001201-ET-V1.mat, 2000-year, 12-month,01-day, ET-Evapotranspiration, V1-version 1;unit: mm/day (unit8 need transfer to single or double and should be divided by 10);data type: unit8 was used to save the disk space, 255 is used for ocean and water body pixels.
Monthly ET File name: ETm200012-ET-V1.mat, 2000-year, 12-month, ET-Evapotranspiration, V1-version 1;unit: mm/month (int16 need transfer to single or double and should be divided by 10);data type: int16 was used to save the disk space, 0 is used for ocean and water body pixels.

The daily ET dataset is produced with a similar method and satellite data as in Chen, X., et al., 2014: Development of a 10 year (2001–2010) 0.1° dataset of land-surface energy balance for mainland China, Atmos. Chem. Phys., 14, 13097–13117, doi:10.5194/acp-14-13097-2014. The calculation of roughness length and kB_1 for global land were updated by the method in Chen, X., et al, 2019, A Column Canopy‐Air Turbulent Diffusion Method for Different Canopy Structures, Journal of Geophysical Research: Atmospheres, 2019.01.15, 124. Most of the satellite input data were from MODIS. Meteorological data was from ERA-Interim. Global canopy height information was derived from GLAS and MODIS NDVI. 

The daily ET has a mean bias (MB) of 0.04 mm/day, RMSE is 1.56 (±0.25) mm/day.
metadata.descriptionCn:
本数据集是通过卫星数据和地表能量平衡法得到的全球陆地地表每天和每月的蒸散发量。该数据集的空间分辨率是5公里。ET数据生产的算法主要采用Chen et al. 2019 JGR 和Chen et al. 2013 (JAMC)最新修订的SEBS 算法。如何采用热红外得到无缝的每日蒸发资料请参考 Chen et al. 2021 JGR, 该文还对不同蒸发产品做了对比，结果发现该产品在灌溉区显著优于Landflux, GLEAM, MOD16, GLDAS, 和ERA-Interim 产品，再分析驱动数据的降尺度详见该文。MODIS LST，NDVI，全球森林高度，GlobAlbedo都已经用于此ET数据集的计算中。模型产生的全球地表感热通量、净辐射通量和潜热通量可以联系作者获得。

日蒸散发文件命名规则: 20001201-ET-V1.mat, 2000-year, 12-month,01-day, ET-Evapotranspiration, V1-version 1;蒸发单位: 毫米每天 (数据存储采用unit8格式，需转成单精度或双精度，转换后需要除10再使用)；数据类型: 为了减小数据保存空间，采用unit8的数据保存格式，海洋和陆地水体象元为固定值255.
月蒸散发文件命名规则: ETm200012-ET-V1.mat, 2000-year, 12-month, ET-Evapotranspiration, V1-version 1; 蒸发单位:毫米每月 (数据存储采用int16格式，转成单精度或双精度使用，另外转换后需要除10); 数据类型:为减少存储空间采用int16的数据格式，海洋和陆地水体象元为固定值0.

background: Because of the elevation of the Tibetan Plateau, energy and water are exchanged between the surface and the middle troposphere above it. The growing interest in the interaction between atmosphere and plateau surface is driven by the realization that the thermal effects of the plateau may influence atmospheric circulation in the Northern Hemisphere (Tao and Ding 1981; Wang et al. 2011). Conventional meteorological techniques that employ point measurements to estimate the components of the surface energy balance represent work on a local scale (Su et al. 2006). Remote sensing enables us to estimate surface fluxes from local to regional scales and offers the possibility to derive the regional distribution of land surface heat fluxes over little-instrumented and sparsely populated areas. Recent studies have explored remote sensing approaches to estimate the regional distribution of surface heat fluxes (Ma et al. 2003, 2008b, 2011). The Surface Energy Balance System (SEBS) developed by Su (2002) can estimate turbulent heat fluxes from point to continental scale with reasonable accuracy using satellite and meteorological data (Su et al. 2005; Oku et al. 2007, etc.). The roughness height for heat transfer z0h needs to be determined to accurately calculate the sensible heat flux by means of the Monin–Obukhov similarity theory (MOST) and SEBS. The scalar roughness height for heat transfer can be derived from z0h = z0m/exp(kB21), where z0m is the roughness height for momentum transfer and kB21 is the excess resistance for heat transportation, with k again being the von Kármán constant and B21 being the Stanton number. SEBS has been widely used to estimate the surface energy balance and evapotranspiration in different areas; further analysis of the uncertainties has been limited, however.
research objective: In this study, the performance of the Surface Energy Balance System (SEBS) has been tested and evaluated for typical land surfaces on the Tibetan Plateau on the basis of time series of observations at four sites with bare soil, sparse canopy, dense canopy, and snow surface, respectively. In this study, we first tested at four different land cover units whether SEBS driven by boundary layer meteorological measurements, as opposed to tower-based flux measurements, can be used to derive items of surface energy balance over the Tibetan Plateau. Then, we evaluated the impact of varying parameters on H estimates from SEBS and used this information to try to identify the causes of SEBS’s biases. We then improved the turbulent heat parameterization in SEBS—to be specific, the equation for kB21.
challenges: The lack of observational datasets on the interactions between the whole plateau and the atmosphere above makes it difficult for us to quantitatively analyze the variation in energy and water exchanges in this region. Although significant progress has been made, further efforts are needed to improve the accuracy of SEBS over the Tibetan Plateau regions (Su et al. 2006). Few formulas are able to describe the observed diurnal variation in kB21 over the Tibetan Plateau (Ma et al. 2009). The sensitivity of sensible heat flux estimates from SEBS has not yet been fully examined.
methods: The high-frequency turbulence data were processed to produce half-hourly fluxes. Calibrations of the eddy-covariance signals were also executed. Meteorological and soil-observation data were sampled every 10 min. All datasets were then resampled to 30-min intervals by nearest interpolation method. The TK2 software package (Mauder and Foken 2011) was used here to process the turbulent data of QOMS/CAS, Nam Co, and Linzhi. The spike-detection algorithm of Vickers and Mahrt (1997) was used to remove physically or electronically unfeasible values in the high-frequency turbulent data. The time delay between sonic-anemometer (CSAT3) and gas-analyzer (LI-7500) signals was eliminated by maximizing covariance. Tilt correction was done with the planar-fit method (Wilczak et al. 2001). Correction of spectral loss was done according to the Moore (1986) method. The sonic temperature was converted into actual temperature. The Webb–Pearman–Leuning (WPL) corrections (Webb et al. 1980) were also performed in the process. The SEBS model was run to produce accurate sensible heat flux results, which was achieved by using available observational variables.
dataset: Data used in this paper were collected at four research stations on the Tibetan Plateau: Qomolangma Station for Atmospheric and Environmental Observation and Research from the Chinese Academy of Sciences (hereinafter QOMS/CAS), Nam Co Monitoring and Research Station for Multisphere Interactions (hereinafter Nam Co), Linzhi Station for Alpine Environment Observation and Research (hereinafter Linzhi station), and Maqu station. The dataset of the QOMS/CAS station consists of surface radiation components (Kipp and Zonen, Inc., model CNR-1); vertical profiles of air temperature, humidity, wind speed and direction (Vaisala, Inc., model MILOS520); and turbulent fluxes. A dataset covering 1 April–31 December 2007 was used in this paper. The meteorological measurements (sensor height, depth, and types) taken at Nam Co and QOMS/CAS are the same. A dataset covering 25 February–30 October 2007 was used from this site for the study. Meteorological measurements from each station used in this study have been listed in Table 2.
findings: Both under- and overestimation at low and high sensible heat fluxes by SEBS was discovered. The results show that the revised model performs better than the original model.
backgroundCn: 由于青藏高原的海拔，能量和水分在其表面与中层对流层之间进行交换。对大气与高原表面相互作用的日益关注源于认识到高原的热效应可能影响北半球的大气环流（Tao和Ding 1981；Wang等，2011）。传统的气象技术通过点测量来估算表面能量平衡的组成部分，代表了局部尺度的工作（Su等，2006）。遥感技术使我们能够从地方到区域尺度估算表面通量，并提供了在仪器稀少和人口稀少地区推导区域地表热通量分布的可能性。最近的研究探讨了遥感方法以估算表面热通量的区域分布（Ma等，2003，2008b，2011）。由Su（2002）开发的表面能量平衡系统（SEBS）能够利用卫星和气象数据以合理的精度从点到大陆尺度估算湍流热通量（Su等，2005；Oku等，2007等）。为了通过Monin–Obukhov相似理论（MOST）和SEBS准确计算显热通量，需要确定热传输的粗糙高度z0h。热传输的标量粗糙高度可以通过z0h = z0m/exp(kB21)推导，其中z0m是动量传输的粗糙高度，kB21是热传输的过量阻力，k是冯·卡门常数，B21是斯坦顿数。SEBS已被广泛用于估算不同地区的表面能量平衡和蒸散发；然而，对不确定性的进一步分析仍然有限。
research objectiveCn: 在本研究中，基于四个地点的观测时间序列，测试和评估了表面能量平衡系统（SEBS）在典型土地表面上的性能，这些地点分别为裸土、稀疏植被、密集植被和雪面。我们首先测试了在四种不同的土地覆盖单元中，SEBS是否可以利用边界层气象测量数据，而不是基于塔的通量测量，来推导出青藏高原的表面能量平衡项。然后，我们评估了不同参数对SEBS的H估计的影响，并利用这些信息尝试识别SEBS偏差的原因。接着，我们改进了SEBS中的湍流热参数化，具体来说，是kB21的公式。
challengesCn: 缺乏关于整个高原与其上方大气相互作用的观测数据集，使我们难以定量分析该地区能量和水分交换的变化。尽管已经取得了显著进展，但仍需进一步努力以提高高原地区SEBS的准确性（Su et al. 2006）。目前很少有公式能够描述高原地区kB21的观测日变化（Ma et al. 2009）。SEBS对显热通量估计的敏感性尚未得到充分检验。
methodsCn: 高频湍流数据经过处理，生成了半小时的通量。涡度协方差信号的校准也已执行。气象和土壤观测数据每10分钟采样一次。所有数据集随后通过最近邻插值法重采样为30分钟间隔。这里使用TK2软件包（Mauder和Foken 2011）处理QOMS/CAS、纳木措和林芝的湍流数据。采用Vickers和Mahrt（1997）的尖峰检测算法去除高频湍流数据中物理或电子上不可行的值。通过最大化协方差消除声学风速仪（CSAT3）和气体分析仪（LI-7500）信号之间的时间延迟。使用平面拟合方法（Wilczak等，2001）进行了倾斜校正。根据Moore（1986）的方法进行了谱损失校正。声学温度被转换为实际温度。还在过程中进行了Webb–Pearman–Leuning（WPL）校正（Webb等，1980）。SEBS模型被运行以生成准确的显热通量结果，这通过使用可用的观测变量实现。
datasetCn: 本论文中使用的数据是在四个研究站点上收集的，位于青藏高原：来自中国科学院的珠穆朗玛峰大气与环境观测研究站（以下简称QOMS/CAS）、纳木错多球体相互作用监测与研究站（以下简称纳木错）、林芝高原环境观测与研究站（以下简称林芝站）和玛曲站。QOMS/CAS站的数据集包括表面辐射分量（Kipp和Zonen公司，型号CNR-1）；空气温度、湿度、风速和风向的垂直剖面（维萨拉公司，型号MILOS520）；以及湍流通量。本文使用的数据集覆盖2007年4月1日至12月31日。纳木错和QOMS/CAS站的气象测量（传感器高度、深度和类型）相同。本文使用的纳木错站的数据集覆盖2007年2月25日至10月30日。每个站点的气象测量数据已在表2中列出。
findingsCn: 在低和高显热通量下，SEBS模型都发现了低估和高估的情况。结果表明，修订后的模型表现优于原始模型。

background: Evapotranspiration (ET) is the turbulent flux of water vapor from the land surface into the air, including soil evaporation, interception from the canopy, and transpiration through the stomata of plants. ET is modulated by surface turbulence (Su et al., 2001), boundary-layer processes (Kim & Entekhabi, 1998), and biophysics (Verhoef & Egea, 2014). Various ET models that apply different physical process parameterizations have been developed to estimate land surface ET. Different models have resulted in large differences in ET estimation at the continental to global scale (Jiménez et al., 2011; Mueller et al., 2011). Variation among global ET estimates indicate a 50% uncertainty in the annual mean value (Su & Feng, 2015; Vinukollu).
research objective: Currently available evapotranspiration (ET) products have not provided us with an accurate estimation for global irrigated land area. Thermal energy balance (EB) model has the potential to solve this problem. The accurate estimation of aerodynamic resistances is a major complication in most remote sensing ET models.
challenges: The estimation of surface resistance is a major issue in most remote sensing ET models, especially the estimation of canopy and aerodynamic resistances. In addition, most estimation approaches do not address the dynamic changes in aerodynamic resistance with roughness and stability.
methods: A method was developed to more realistically depict dynamic changes in aerodynamic resistance. In order to estimate global ET and land surface fluxes for all weather conditions, Moderate Resolution Imaging Spectroradiometer (MODIS) Aqua and Terra land surface temperature fields were combined and a nearest-evaporative-fraction gap-filling method was merged into the EB model. A global ET product covering the period 2003–2017 was produced using the EB model. By combining thermal and optional information from MODIS satellites and surface meteorological forcing data from ERA-Interim reanalysis data, the EB model provides a 5 × 5 km resolution estimate of daily ET without spatio-temporal gaps at the global scale.
findings: Analysis of global precipitation minus ET demonstrated that EB ET has a relatively higher potential for agriculture water resource management than currently available global ET products, such as Landflux, GLEAM, MOD16, GLDAS, and ERA-Interim ET.
backgroundCn: 蒸散发（ET）是水蒸气从地表向空气的湍流通量，包括土壤蒸发、树冠的截留和植物气孔的蒸腾。ET受表面湍流（Su et al., 2001）、边界层过程（Kim & Entekhabi, 1998）和生物物理学（Verhoef & Egea, 2014）的调节。已经开发出多种ET模型，这些模型应用不同的物理过程参数化来估算陆地表面的ET。不同模型在大陆到全球尺度上的ET估算结果存在较大差异（Jiménez et al., 2011; Mueller et al., 2011）。全球ET估算的变化表明年均值存在50%的不确定性（Su & Feng, 2015; Vinukollu）。
research objectiveCn: 目前可用的蒸散发（ET）产品未能为全球灌溉土地面积提供准确的估计。热能平衡（EB）模型有潜力解决这个问题。气动阻力的准确估计是大多数遥感ET模型中的一个主要复杂因素。
challengesCn: 表面阻力的估计是大多数遥感蒸散发模型中的一个主要问题，尤其是冠层和气动阻力的估计。此外，大多数估计方法并未考虑由于粗糙度和稳定性引起的气动阻力的动态变化。
methodsCn: 一种方法被开发出来，以更真实地描绘气动阻力的动态变化。为了估算全球蒸散发（ET）和陆面通量在所有天气条件下的情况，将中分辨率成像光谱仪（MODIS）Aqua和Terra的陆面温度场结合起来，并将最近蒸发分数的缺口填补方法与EB模型合并。利用EB模型，生成了覆盖2003年至2017年期间的全球ET产品。通过结合MODIS卫星的热信息和可选信息以及来自ERA-Interim再分析数据的地面气象强迫数据，EB模型提供了一个5 × 5公里分辨率的全球日蒸散发估算，且没有时空缺口。
findingsCn: 全球降水减去蒸散的分析表明，EB ET在农业水资源管理方面的潜力相对高于目前可用的全球ET产品，如Landflux、GLEAM、MOD16、GLDAS和ERA-Interim ET。

Verification.QuestionEn: Does the EB model provide a 5 km resolution estimate of daily evapotranspiration without spatio-temporal gaps at the global scale?
Verification.QuestionCn: EB模型是否提供全球范围内无时空间缺口的日蒸散发5公里分辨率估计？

Verification.QuestionEn: Is the lack of observational datasets on the Tibetan Plateau a challenge in analyzing energy and water exchanges in the region?
Verification.QuestionCn: 缺乏对青藏高原的观测数据集是否是分析该地区能量和水分交换的一个挑战？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Is the Surface Energy Balance System (SEBS) model or the Thermal Energy Balance (EB) model more effective for estimating global evapotranspiration in irrigated land areas?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 表面能量平衡系统（SEBS）模型还是热能平衡（EB）模型在估算灌溉土地区域的全球蒸散发方面更有效？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Which method addresses dynamic changes in aerodynamic resistance more effectively when estimating evapotranspiration: traditional estimation approaches or the method developed to combine MODIS data with ERA-Interim reanalysis?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 哪种方法在估算蒸散发时更有效地应对气动阻力的动态变化：传统估算方法还是结合MODIS数据与ERA-Interim再分析数据的方法？
Disjunctive.AnswerEn: The method developed to combine MODIS data with ERA-Interim reanalysis
Disjunctive.AnswerCn: 将MODIS数据与ERA-Interim再分析结合的方法

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a dataset used to evaluate the performance of a surface energy balance system in a specific region?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于评估特定区域表面能量平衡系统性能的数据集示例？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a dataset used to evaluate the performance of a surface energy balance system is the data collected at four research stations on the Tibetan Plateau, including surface radiation components, vertical profiles of air temperature, humidity, wind speed, direction, and turbulent fluxes. This dataset was used to test and evaluate the SEBS model for different land surfaces.
Example.AnswerCn: 用于评估表面能量平衡系统性能的数据集的一个例子是，在青藏 Plateau 上四个研究站收集的数据，包括表面辐射成分、空气温度、湿度、风速、风向的垂直剖面以及湍流通量。该数据集用于测试和评估 SEBS 模型在不同土地表面上的表现。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics of data formats used in the evapotranspiration datasets based on surface energy balance?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 基于表面能量平衡的蒸散发数据集使用的数据格式的特点是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: unit8 format, int16 format, conversion to single or double precision, division by 10, fixed values for ocean and land water body pixels
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: unit8格式，int16格式，转换为单精度或双精度，除以10，海洋和陆地水体像素的固定值。

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the spatial resolution of the global land surface daily and monthly evapotranspiration dataset obtained using the surface energy balance method?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 使用表面能量平衡方法获得的全球陆地表面日常和月度蒸散发数据集的空间分辨率是多少？

Quantification.QuestionEn: Over what period is the global evapotranspiration product covering, as produced using the energy balance model?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 全球蒸散发产品是使用能量平衡模型生成的，覆盖的时间段是什么？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is meant by 'aerodynamic resistance' in remote sensing evapotranspiration models?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在遥感蒸散模型中，“空气动力阻力”是什么意思？
Definition.AnswerEn: Aerodynamic resistance refers to the resistance encountered by water vapor as it moves from the land surface to the atmosphere in remote sensing evapotranspiration models. The accurate estimation of aerodynamic resistances is a major challenge in ET models, as it is influenced by factors like roughness and stability, and it is crucial for producing accurate land surface flux estimates.
Definition.AnswerCn: 气动阻力是指水蒸气从地表移动到大气中时所遇到的阻力，在遥感蒸散发模型中具有重要意义。准确估计气动阻力是蒸散发模型中的一大挑战，因为它受到粗糙度和稳定性等因素的影响，而这对于产生准确的地表通量估计至关重要。

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'thermal energy balance (EB) model' imply in the context of global evapotranspiration estimation?
Definition.QuestionCn: “热能平衡（EB）模型”在全球蒸散发估算的背景下意味着什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: The thermal energy balance (EB) model is a method used to estimate global evapotranspiration and land surface fluxes by combining satellite thermal imagery with meteorological data. It addresses the challenge of accurately estimating aerodynamic resistances and provides a high-resolution estimate of daily ET without spatio-temporal gaps. It shows potential for improving water resource management in agriculture compared to other global ET products.
Definition.AnswerCn: 热能平衡（EB）模型是一种通过结合卫星热成像和气象数据来估算全球蒸散发和陆面通量的方法。它解决了准确估计气动阻力的挑战，并提供了高分辨率的每日蒸散发估计，且没有时空间的缺口。与其他全球蒸散发产品相比，它在改善农业水资源管理方面显示出潜力。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the methods for estimating global evapotranspiration from remote sensing data compare to traditional point measurement techniques in terms of accuracy and applicability across different land surfaces?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 从遥感数据估算全球蒸散发的方法与传统点测量技术在准确性和适用性方面的比较如何，尤其是在不同土地表面上？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Remote sensing methods such as the Surface Energy Balance System (SEBS) allow for estimation of surface heat fluxes from local to regional scales and have been tested on various land surfaces such as bare soil, sparse canopy, dense canopy, and snow surfaces. These methods offer the advantage of covering large-scale, sparsely populated areas, which is a limitation of traditional point measurement techniques. Traditional techniques provide local scale data, while remote sensing can extend to continental scales.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 遥感方法，如表面能量平衡系统（SEBS），可以从地方到区域尺度估算表面热通量，并已在裸土、稀疏冠层、密集冠层和雪面等各种地表上进行了测试。这些方法的优势在于能够覆盖大规模、稀疏人口区域，这是传统点测量技术的一个局限。传统技术提供局部尺度的数据，而遥感可以扩展到大陆尺度。

Comparison.QuestionEn: In what ways do the challenges of estimating aerodynamic resistance in remote sensing ET models differ from those involved in calculating surface resistance?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 在遥感蒸散发模型中，估计气动阻力的挑战与计算表面阻力的挑战有哪些不同之处？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The estimation of aerodynamic resistance in remote sensing ET models primarily deals with dynamic changes with roughness and stability, which are not adequately addressed in many approaches. In contrast, estimating surface resistance involves complexities in dealing with canopy resistance and its various contributing factors. Both present significant challenges, but aerodynamic resistance is more affected by environmental conditions and requires dynamic modeling.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 在遥感蒸散发模型中，气动阻力的估计主要涉及粗糙度和稳定性的动态变化，而许多方法对此并未充分考虑。相比之下，表面阻力的估计涉及处理冠层阻力及其各种影响因素的复杂性。两者都面临重大挑战，但气动阻力更受环境条件的影响，需要动态建模。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How can remote sensing techniques be interpreted to enhance the accuracy of surface heat flux estimation over regions like the Tibetan Plateau?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 如何解释遥感技术以提高对青藏高原等地区地表热通量估算的准确性？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Remote sensing allows for the estimation of surface fluxes across local to regional scales, offering the potential to derive the distribution of land surface heat fluxes in sparsely instrumented areas. The Surface Energy Balance System (SEBS) leverages satellite and meteorological data to estimate heat fluxes accurately, although uncertainties remain, particularly in regions like the Tibetan Plateau where observational datasets are limited.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 遥感技术可以在地方到区域尺度上估算表面通量，提供了在仪器稀缺地区推导陆地表面热通量分布的潜力。表面能量平衡系统（SEBS）利用卫星和气象数据准确估算热通量，尽管在观测数据集有限的地区，如青藏高原，仍然存在不确定性。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What challenges and considerations emerge when inferring aerodynamic resistances in remote sensing ET models?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 在遥感蒸散发模型中推断气动阻力时，会出现哪些挑战和考虑因素？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The estimation of surface resistance, particularly canopy and aerodynamic resistances, poses significant challenges in remote sensing ET models. Most approaches struggle with capturing dynamic changes in aerodynamic resistance due to roughness and stability, complicating accurate ET estimation.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 表面阻力的估算，特别是冠层阻力和气动阻力，在遥感蒸散发模型中面临重大挑战。大多数方法难以捕捉由于粗糙度和稳定性引起的气动阻力的动态变化，从而使得准确的蒸散发估算变得复杂。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What insights can be inferred from the comparative performance of different global ET products in managing agricultural water resources?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 从不同全球ET产品在管理农业水资源方面的比较表现中可以推断出哪些见解？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The EB ET model has shown a higher potential for agricultural water management compared to other global ET products like Landflux, GLEAM, MOD16, GLDAS, and ERA-Interim. This is inferred from the analysis of global precipitation minus ET, suggesting that the EB ET model provides a more accurate estimation of water availability for agriculture.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: EB ET模型在农业水管理方面显示出比其他全球ET产品（如Landflux、GLEAM、MOD16、GLDAS和ERA-Interim）更高的潜力。这是通过对全球降水减去ET的分析得出的，表明EB ET模型提供了更准确的农业水资源可用性估计。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes the Surface Energy Balance System (SEBS) to either overestimate or underestimate sensible heat fluxes in certain regions?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 什么原因导致表面能量平衡系统（SEBS）在某些地区高估或低估感热通量？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Both under- and overestimation at low and high sensible heat fluxes by SEBS have been discovered. The sensitivity of sensible heat flux estimates from SEBS has not yet been fully examined, which contributes to these discrepancies.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在低和高显热通量下，SEBS的估计存在低估和高估的现象。SEBS对显热通量估计的敏感性尚未得到充分研究，这导致了这些差异。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is accurately estimating aerodynamic resistances a significant challenge in remote sensing evapotranspiration models?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 准确估计气动阻力在遥感蒸散发模型中是一个重大挑战，原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The estimation of surface resistance, particularly canopy and aerodynamic resistances, poses a major challenge in remote sensing ET models. Most estimation approaches fail to address the dynamic changes in aerodynamic resistance with roughness and stability, complicating accurate ET estimation.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 表面阻力的估计，特别是冠层和气动阻力，在遥感蒸散发模型中是一个主要挑战。大多数估计方法未能考虑气动阻力随粗糙度和稳定性的动态变化，这使得准确的蒸散发估计变得复杂。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How does the use of dynamic aerodynamic resistance models impact the reliability of evapotranspiration data in remote sensing applications?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 动态气动阻力模型的使用如何影响遥感应用中蒸散发数据的可靠性？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Using dynamic aerodynamic resistance models improves the reliability of evapotranspiration data by more realistically depicting changes in aerodynamic resistance due to roughness and stability. This addresses a major issue in remote sensing ET models, enhancing the accuracy of global ET estimates for various weather conditions.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用动态气动阻力模型提高了蒸散发数据的可靠性，因为它更真实地描绘了由于粗糙度和稳定性变化而导致的气动阻力变化。这解决了遥感蒸散发模型中的一个主要问题，提高了在各种天气条件下全球蒸散发估算的准确性。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the goals of employing remote sensing techniques to estimate surface fluxes over sparsely populated regions like the Tibetan Plateau?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 采用遥感技术估计像青藏 Plateau 这样稀疏人口地区的表面通量的目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The goal is to enable estimation of surface fluxes from local to regional scales, offering the possibility to derive the regional distribution of land surface heat fluxes over little-instrumented and sparsely populated areas. This addresses the lack of observational datasets and helps understand energy and water exchanges in these regions.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标是能够从地方到区域尺度估算表面通量，提供在仪器较少和人口稀疏地区推导区域土地表面热通量分布的可能性。这解决了观测数据集不足的问题，并有助于理解这些地区的能量和水分交换。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedural steps are taken to ensure the accuracy of evapotranspiration estimates when using remote sensing data combined with surface meteorological forcing data?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在使用遥感数据结合地面气象强迫数据时，为确保蒸散发估算的准确性，采取了哪些程序步骤？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: To ensure the accuracy of evapotranspiration estimates, a method is developed to depict dynamic changes in aerodynamic resistance. Moderate Resolution Imaging Spectroradiometer (MODIS) Aqua and Terra land surface temperature fields are combined, and a nearest-evaporative-fraction gap-filling method is merged into the energy balance (EB) model. This process involves combining thermal and optional information from MODIS satellites and surface meteorological forcing data from ERA-Interim reanalysis data to provide a 5 × 5 km resolution estimate of daily ET without spatio-temporal gaps at the global scale.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 为了确保蒸散发估算的准确性，开发了一种方法来描绘气动阻力的动态变化。将中分辨率成像光谱仪（MODIS）Aqua和Terra的地表温度场结合起来，并将最近蒸发分数的缺口填补方法与能量平衡（EB）模型相结合。这个过程涉及将MODIS卫星的热信息和可选信息与来自ERA-Interim再分析数据的地表气象强迫数据结合，以提供全球范围内无时空缺口的每日蒸散发估算，分辨率为5 × 5公里。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How can high-frequency turbulence data be processed to produce accurate half-hourly flux measurements in a study on the Tibetan Plateau?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 如何处理高频湍流数据以在青藏高原研究中产生准确的半小时通量测量？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: High-frequency turbulence data can be processed to produce accurate half-hourly flux measurements through several steps: calibrating eddy-covariance signals, sampling meteorological and soil-observation data every 10 minutes, and resampling all datasets to 30-minute intervals using the nearest interpolation method. Additional steps involve using the TK2 software package to process turbulent data, applying a spike-detection algorithm to remove unfeasible values, eliminating time delays between signals by maximizing covariance, performing tilt correction with the planar-fit method, and correcting for spectral loss using the Moore method. Sonic temperature conversion and the Webb–Pearman–Leuning (WPL) corrections are also performed.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 高频湍流数据可以通过几个步骤处理，以产生准确的半小时通量测量：校准涡度协方差信号，每10分钟采样气象和土壤观测数据，并使用最近邻插值法将所有数据集重新采样到30分钟间隔。其他步骤包括使用TK2软件包处理湍流数据，应用尖峰检测算法去除不合理值，通过最大化协方差消除信号之间的时间延迟，使用平面拟合方法进行倾斜修正，以及使用Moore方法进行谱损失修正。还进行声学温度转换和Webb–Pearman–Leuning (WPL)修正。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What specific challenges must be addressed when estimating surface resistance in remote sensing evapotranspiration models, and how can these be overcome?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在遥感蒸散发模型中，估计表面阻力时必须解决哪些具体挑战，以及如何克服这些挑战？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: A major challenge in estimating surface resistance in remote sensing evapotranspiration models is accurately estimating canopy and aerodynamic resistances, particularly regarding their dynamic changes with roughness and stability. This can be overcome by developing methods that realistically depict these dynamic changes, which involves integrating satellite-derived thermal information and meteorological data to provide comprehensive and continuous global ET estimates.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 在遥感蒸散发模型中，准确估计冠层和气动阻力是估算表面阻力的一大挑战，特别是在考虑粗糙度和稳定性动态变化时。为了解决这个问题，可以开发能够真实描绘这些动态变化的方法，这涉及整合卫星获取的热信息和气象数据，以提供全面和连续的全球蒸散发估算。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What meteorological and satellite data integration techniques enable the accurate estimation of land surface energy balance and evapotranspiration at a regional scale?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些气象和卫星数据集成技术能够在区域尺度上准确估计地表能量平衡和蒸散发？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The integration of satellite data and meteorological measurements, as seen with the Surface Energy Balance System (SEBS), enables the estimation of land surface energy balance and evapotranspiration. The use of thermal infrared data, MODIS LST, NDVI, and global forest height information aids in producing these estimates without spatio-temporal gaps, allowing for accurate assessments at regional scales.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 卫星数据与气象测量的结合，如表面能量平衡系统（SEBS），使得土地表面能量平衡和蒸散发的估算成为可能。利用热红外数据、MODIS地表温度（LST）、归一化植被指数（NDVI）和全球森林高度信息，有助于在没有时空间间隙的情况下生成这些估算，从而在区域尺度上进行准确评估。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How does the application of remote sensing technologies enable the overcoming of challenges related to the estimation of aerodynamic and surface resistances in evapotranspiration models?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 遥感技术的应用如何帮助克服与蒸散发模型中气动阻力和表面阻力估计相关的挑战？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Remote sensing technologies, like those used in the EB model, allow for the dynamic depiction of changes in aerodynamic resistance, which is a major challenge in ET models. By combining thermal information from MODIS satellites with meteorological data from ERA-Interim reanalysis, these technologies enable the accurate estimation of ET without gaps due to their ability to address changes in roughness and stability.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 遥感技术，如EB模型中使用的技术，能够动态描绘气动阻力的变化，这是ET模型中的一个主要挑战。通过将MODIS卫星的热信息与ERA-Interim再分析的气象数据相结合，这些技术能够准确估计ET，避免因粗糙度和稳定性变化而导致的缺口。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What are the enabling conditions that facilitate the collection of high-frequency turbulence data for the accurate determination of surface fluxes in sparsely populated areas?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 促进在稀疏人口地区收集高频湍流数据以准确确定表面通量的条件有哪些？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The collection of high-frequency turbulence data in sparsely populated areas is enabled by deploying research stations equipped with necessary instruments, such as sonic anemometers and gas analyzers. These stations, like those on the Tibetan Plateau, provide crucial meteorological and soil-observation data, which are processed using techniques such as spike-detection algorithms, tilt correction, and spectral loss correction to produce accurate surface flux measurements.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 在稀疏人口地区收集高频湍流数据的工作通过部署配备必要仪器的研究站来实现，例如声学风速计和气体分析仪。这些站点，如位于青藏高原的研究站，提供关键的气象和土壤观测数据，这些数据通过尖峰检测算法、倾斜校正和谱损失校正等技术进行处理，以产生准确的表面通量测量。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might there be challenges in accurately estimating surface resistance in remote sensing evapotranspiration models?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在遥感蒸散发模型中，准确估计表面阻力可能面临挑战的原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The estimation of surface resistance in remote sensing ET models is complicated due to the dynamic changes in canopy and aerodynamic resistances, which are impacted by factors such as roughness and stability. Many models do not adequately address these variations, leading to challenges in achieving accurate estimations.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 在遥感ET模型中，表面阻力的估计受到树冠和气动阻力动态变化的影响，这些变化受到粗糙度和稳定性等因素的影响。许多模型未能充分考虑这些变化，导致准确估计面临挑战。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What factors could contribute to the discrepancies observed between different global evapotranspiration estimates?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 导致不同全球蒸散发估计之间差异的因素有哪些？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Discrepancies between global ET estimates can arise from the varying physical process parameterizations applied by different ET models. These differences can significantly affect ET estimation at large scales, with some studies indicating a 50% uncertainty in the annual mean value, suggesting that the models' approaches to representing surface turbulence, boundary-layer processes, and biophysics can lead to significant variations.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 全球蒸散发（ET）估计之间的差异可能源于不同ET模型所采用的物理过程参数化。这些差异可能在大尺度上显著影响ET估计，一些研究表明年均值的不确定性可达50%，这表明模型在表面湍流、边界层过程和生物物理学的表示方法上存在显著差异，从而导致显著的变化。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might the SEBS model overestimate or underestimate sensible heat fluxes compared to observations?
Expectation.QuestionCn: SEBS模型可能会高估或低估与观测值相比的显热通量，原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The SEBS model may overestimate or underestimate sensible heat fluxes due to the challenges in accurately parameterizing turbulent heat fluxes and the uncertainties related to the roughness height for heat transfer. These issues, along with the limited examination of the sensitivity of sensible heat flux estimates, can lead to biases in the model's predictions.
Expectation.AnswerCn: SEBS模型可能会由于准确参数化湍流热通量的挑战以及与热传递粗糙度高度相关的不确定性而高估或低估显热通量。这些问题，加上对显热通量估计敏感性的有限研究，可能导致模型预测中的偏差。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What are the complexities associated with accurately estimating aerodynamic resistances in remote sensing ET models, and how might these challenges impact the quality of global ET datasets?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 准确估计遥感ET模型中的气动阻力所涉及的复杂性有哪些，这些挑战可能如何影响全球ET数据集的质量？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The estimation of aerodynamic resistances is a major complication in remote sensing ET models. Most approaches do not address the dynamic changes in aerodynamic resistance with roughness and stability, which can affect the accuracy of global ET datasets. The EB model attempts to solve this by including a method for more realistically depicting these dynamic changes.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 气动阻力的估算是遥感蒸散发（ET）模型中的一个主要复杂因素。大多数方法没有考虑粗糙度和稳定性对气动阻力的动态变化，这可能会影响全球ET数据集的准确性。EB模型试图通过包含一种更现实地描绘这些动态变化的方法来解决这个问题。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What are the potential benefits and limitations of using the SEBS model for estimating surface energy balance and evapotranspiration over sparsely populated areas like the Tibetan Plateau?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 使用SEBS模型估算像青藏高原这样稀疏人口地区的表面能量平衡和蒸散发的潜在好处和局限性是什么？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The SEBS model can estimate turbulent heat fluxes from point to continental scale using satellite and meteorological data, which is beneficial for sparsely populated areas like the Tibetan Plateau. However, the model's performance can be affected by uncertainties in parameterization, such as the roughness height for heat transfer. Further analysis is needed to improve its accuracy in these regions.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: SEBS模型可以利用卫星和气象数据从点到大陆尺度估算湍流热通量，这对像青藏高原这样的人口稀少地区非常有益。然而，模型的性能可能会受到参数化不确定性的影响，例如热传递的粗糙度高度。需要进一步分析以提高其在这些地区的准确性。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't make sense of how aerodynamic resistances are accurately estimated in remote sensing evapotranspiration models.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解在遥感蒸散发模型中如何准确估计气动阻力。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The estimation of aerodynamic resistances is a major challenge in most remote sensing ET models, and a specific method was developed to more realistically depict dynamic changes in these resistances. This involves combining thermal and optional information from MODIS satellites and surface meteorological data to provide a detailed estimate of aerodynamic resistance.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 气动阻力的估算是大多数遥感蒸散发（ET）模型中的一个主要挑战，为此开发了一种特定的方法，以更真实地描绘这些阻力的动态变化。这涉及结合MODIS卫星的热信息和光学信息以及地面气象数据，以提供气动阻力的详细估计。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I'm unsure about the significance of using thermal energy balance models for estimating evapotranspiration on a global scale.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我对在全球范围内使用热能平衡模型估算蒸散发的重要性感到不确定。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Thermal energy balance models have the potential to accurately estimate ET, especially for global irrigated land areas. These models address complications in ET estimation by accurately estimating aerodynamic resistances and using thermal data from MODIS satellites, providing a higher potential for agricultural water resource management compared to other global ET products.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 热能平衡模型有潜力准确估计蒸散发（ET），特别是在全球灌溉土地区域。这些模型通过准确估计气动阻力并利用MODIS卫星的热数据，解决了蒸散发估计中的复杂问题，相较于其他全球蒸散发产品，提供了更高的农业水资源管理潜力。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how remote sensing approaches can derive regional distributions of land surface heat fluxes with reasonable accuracy.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不理解遥感方法如何能够以合理的精度推导出区域土地表面热通量的分布。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Remote sensing enables the estimation of surface fluxes from local to regional scales. The Surface Energy Balance System (SEBS) model, in particular, can estimate turbulent heat fluxes using satellite and meteorological data, and it has been widely used to estimate surface energy balance and evapotranspiration, despite some uncertainties.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 遥感技术能够从地方到区域尺度估算表面通量。表面能量平衡系统（SEBS）模型特别能够利用卫星和气象数据估算湍流热通量，并且它已被广泛用于估算表面能量平衡和蒸散发，尽管存在一些不确定性。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please analyze the effectiveness of different remote sensing approaches in estimating regional distributions of surface heat fluxes and their potential challenges.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请分析不同遥感方法在估算区域表面热通量分布方面的有效性及其潜在挑战。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Recent studies have used remote sensing approaches to estimate the regional distribution of surface heat fluxes, such as the Surface Energy Balance System (SEBS). SEBS can estimate turbulent heat fluxes with reasonable accuracy using satellite and meteorological data. However, challenges include the need for accurate determination of roughness height for heat transfer and the sensitivity of sensible heat flux estimates. Further efforts are needed to improve the accuracy of SEBS, especially in areas like the Tibetan Plateau where observational datasets are limited.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 最近的研究使用遥感方法估计地表热通量的区域分布，例如表面能量平衡系统（SEBS）。SEBS可以利用卫星和气象数据以合理的精度估计湍流热通量。然而，面临的挑战包括需要准确确定热传递的粗糙度高度以及感热通量估计的敏感性。需要进一步努力提高SEBS的准确性，特别是在观测数据集有限的地区，如青藏高原。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please explore the methodologies used in processing high-frequency turbulence data for calculating surface energy balance components.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请探讨用于处理高频湍流数据以计算表面能量平衡组分的方法论。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: High-frequency turbulence data are processed to produce half-hourly fluxes, with calibrations of eddy-covariance signals executed. Meteorological and soil-observation data are sampled every 10 minutes and resampled to 30-minute intervals using the nearest interpolation method. The TK2 software package is used to process the turbulent data, with spike-detection algorithms and corrections for time delay, tilt, and spectral loss applied. The Webb–Pearman–Leuning corrections are performed, and the SEBS model is run using available observational variables to produce accurate sensible heat flux results.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 高频湍流数据经过处理，生成半小时的通量，涡度协方差信号的校准已完成。气象和土壤观测数据每10分钟采样一次，并使用最近插值法重新采样为30分钟间隔。TK2软件包用于处理湍流数据，应用了尖峰检测算法以及时间延迟、倾斜和频谱损失的修正。进行了韦伯-佩尔曼-勒宁校正，并使用可用观测变量运行SEBS模型，以生成准确的显热通量结果。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please investigate the potential for improving global evapotranspiration (ET) product accuracy through advanced modeling techniques and data integration.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请调查通过先进建模技术和数据集成提高全球蒸散发（ET）产品准确性的潜力。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Currently available ET products face challenges in accurately estimating global irrigated land areas. A thermal energy balance (EB) model has been developed to address this issue, with improvements made in estimating aerodynamic resistances. The EB model combines MODIS Aqua and Terra land surface temperature fields with surface meteorological forcing data from ERA-Interim reanalysis to provide a global ET product with a 5 × 5 km resolution. The analysis indicates that this EB ET product has a higher potential for agricultural water resource management compared to existing global ET products like Landflux, GLEAM, MOD16, GLDAS, and ERA-Interim.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 目前可用的ET产品在准确估计全球灌溉土地面积方面面临挑战。为了解决这个问题，开发了一种热能平衡（EB）模型，并在估计气动阻力方面进行了改进。该EB模型结合了MODIS Aqua和Terra的地表温度数据与来自ERA-Interim再分析的地表气象强迫数据，以提供分辨率为5 × 5公里的全球ET产品。分析表明，该EB ET产品在农业水资源管理方面具有比现有全球ET产品（如Landflux、GLEAM、MOD16、GLDAS和ERA-Interim）更高的潜力。
